title: Extraordinary Dairy products - Tillamook
text: Always a good day to dairy. EXTRAORDINARY DAIRY™ Tastes Like VictoryWe don’t just make dairy, we make it extraordinary. Cheddar You’ll Remember. Flavor front runner. Full flavor. And then some. Get the game changer. Replay worthy bites. Host like a pro. 1/3 In the news Get the full scoop. In the news Get the full scoop. Winter Pairings Guide Whole Milk Mozzarella Pairings Pair our cheese with fresh seasonal ingredients and discover winter flavors in a whole new way. Whole milk mozzarella + Roasted butternut squash Roasted squash highlights the buttery, subtle richness of our cheese for a combo that’s sweet and savory. Whole milk mozzarella + Seared figs Caramelized figs with big flavor and a crisp exterior are a delicious contrast to the soft, creamy texture of our mozzarella. Whole milk mozzarella + Prosciutto Salty and pork-forward flavors wrap the creamy, milk fat flavors of our mozzarella for a simple yet satisfying appetizer. Whole milk mozzarella + Myer lemon Bright, slightly sweet lemons cut through the rich creaminess of our mozzarella for a fresh, balanced bite. Whole milk mozzarella + Fire-Roasted Red Peppers Fire-roasted peppers team up with the creamy goodness of our mozzarella for a flavor combo that’s as silky as it is smoky. Whole milk mozzarella + Plums Sweet ripe plums combined with the creamy richness of our cheese have a bright, indulgent bite. Whole milk mozzarella + Pesto Pesto and mozzarella lend a taste of summer, while sun-dried tomatoes add the perfect finish. Whole milk mozzarella + Mexican Chorizo Smoky chorizo and our creamy mozzarella team up for a rich, irresistible bite that’s perfectly melty. Grate things take time Bring those flavors to life You did it — now that our exclusive pairing guide is all yours, use it to mix and match your favorite Tillamook products like a pro. ONE LITTLE BOAT, ONE HUGE TALE. Our brand comes from some pretty incredible beginnings. Discover the big story behind the little boat on all our products. Certified B Corporation® Another year of doing good. If there’s one thing we know, it’s this: you expect Tillamook products to be made with extra care to be extra delicious. That’s why we’re committed to being good stewards. Of cows and farms, people and products, and our communities and the environment. Hungry for more?Our newsletter keeps you in the loop on all of our special releases, discounts, best recipes and limited time offerings. more?Our newsletter keeps you in the loop on all of our special releases, discounts, best recipes and limited time offerings. Find us near you From bold cheddar to extra creamy ice cream, find Tillamook products near you.
